texts.biography: So in tune with Hell Steeds is Hegnaar, it is believed he was once a Hell Steed himself in a past life. He is said to have a raging and firey spirit that is so hot and strong he must release his anger in roars of firey rage.
texts.name: Hegnaar

specialty.description:
{Hell Steeds}

Increases health of any Hell Steeds by 10 HP for every 6 levels. Also Hell Steeds gain 2-hex breath like dragons. Besides, Hegnaar can cast Fire Wall with increased effect by 20%.
specialty.name: Hell Steeds/Fire Wall
